activities:
2.	Truth Technologies is in the business of assisting firms with verifying customer data and the comparison of customer data against watch lists.  The personal data transferred concern financial service clients, prospective clients and persons associated therewith including without limitation beneficial owners and beneficiaries and may include the following data points:
?	Name
?	Address
?	Phone
?	Occupation
?	Work company
?	Work address
?	Work phone number
?	Date of birth
?	Nationality
?	Financial institution internally assigned identification
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
